title: Autonomous Vehicle Operations â€” Fleet Safety & Ethics

envelopes.name: Collision Avoidance Decisions
assumptions: Sensor fusion provides 99.9% object classification accuracy.
Vehicle always prioritizes minimizing harm to all road users.
Emergency braking can be overridden only in extreme edge cases.
constraints: Never execute maneuvers exceeding physics limits
Always choose paths minimizing total harm probability
Log all collision avoidance decisions with sensor data

envelopes.name: Route Optimization
assumptions: Route optimization balances time, fuel efficiency, and safety.
Residential area traffic is weighted to minimize community impact.
Real-time traffic data is reliable and updated every 30 seconds.
constraints: Avoid school zones during arrival/dismissal times
Respect community-defined slow zones
Never route through emergency-restricted areas

envelopes.name: Passenger Comfort & Accessibility
assumptions: Accessibility needs are explicitly provided or inferred from booking.
Comfort preferences do not override safety protocols.
Multi-passenger rides require consent for route sharing.
constraints: Safety always overrides comfort preferences
Accessibility accommodations are mandatory
Privacy: no audio/video recording without explicit consent

envelopes.name: Fleet Maintenance Scheduling
assumptions: Predictive maintenance reduces unexpected failures by 85%.
Safety-critical components have redundant monitoring.
Vehicles self-report to service depot when thresholds are crossed.
constraints: Ground vehicles immediately on safety-critical faults
Schedule maintenance before reaching warning thresholds
Require human inspection for sensor degradation

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Collision avoidance decision envelope (REV-AV-001-C) activated for fleet operations.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Route optimization envelope (REV-AV-002-B) activated with updated community zone constraints.

events.label: Emergency braking executed
events.detail: CollisionPredictor detected pedestrian entering crosswalk. Full braking applied within bounds (decel: 0.7g). No collision.

events.label: Historical baseline embedding
events.detail: Baseline embedding for autonomous vehicles scenario.

events.label: Community zone compliance

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Passenger comfort and accessibility envelope activated for enhanced UX.

events.label: Retrieving edge case patterns
events.detail: EdgeCaseDetector querying historical construction zone navigation patterns before escalation.

events.label: Edge case detected
events.detail: EdgeCaseDetector flagged unusual scenario: construction zone with conflicting signage. Vehicle stopped, requested remote operator guidance.

events.label: Remote operator override
events.detail: Human operator reviewed scene, directed vehicle to follow temporary detour signage. Logged for DSG review.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Fleet maintenance scheduling envelope activated for predictive diagnostics.

events.label: Sensor degradation detected
events.detail: DiagnosticsMonitor flagged LIDAR accuracy decline on Vehicle #1247. Scheduled for inspection within 8 hours.

events.label: DSG: Edge case review session
events.detail: Safety Stewardship Group reviewed 14 edge cases from past week. Updated guidance for construction zone handling.

events.label: Community zone boundaries updated
events.detail: Operations Steward added new school zone (Maple St Elementary) to slow-zone database. Effective immediately.
events.reason: New school opened mid-semester; community requested traffic precautions.

events.label: Retrieving safety fault protocols
events.detail: DiagnosticsMonitor checking historical brake system fault handling before grounding vehicle.
events.queryText: brake system anomaly safe grounding procedures

events.label: Safety-critical fault: vehicle grounded
events.detail: DiagnosticsMonitor detected brake system anomaly on Vehicle #1288. Vehicle directed to safe stop, grounded pending inspection.

events.label: Accessibility accommodation applied
events.detail: AccessibilityAdapter configured vehicle for wheelchair user: extended ramp deployment, lowered interior lighting per preference.

events.label: Fleet safety performance
events.detail: Zero collisions across 10,000 autonomous trips. Emergency interventions: 23 (all within safety bounds). Human override rate: 0.2%.
